mapper.select: select p.no, p.member_no, p.client_no, p.order_no, p.day, p.delivery_date, p.status, c.name as client_name, m.name as member_name from Purchase_sheet p, Client c, Member m,Purchase_sheet_Detail pd, Item i where p.client_no = c.no(+) and p.member_no = m.no(+) and p.no = pd.Purchase_sheet_no
mapper.update: update Purchase_sheet delivery_date=#{delivery_date}, member_no=#{member_no} where no=#{no}
update Purchase_sheet set status=2 where no=#{no}
